channel.title: Review my website design
channel.description:
[CENTER][b]Request if you want me to remove link![/b] [SIZE=4]Hello everyone,[/SIZE]
So today I am here to show off my work that I have been doing for the past week or so adapting my current toplist design to my new one (with before and after pictures). You guys might know about my site as I had a lucky break with the private server 'Xiduth' who helped my site grow insanely fast by providing there help for my growth.
[B][SIZE=4]FEEDBACK IS WELCOME![/SIZE][/B]
[SIZE=5]Before:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://puu.sh/6yixt.jpg[/img] --- [IMG]http://puu.sh/6yizo.jpg[/img]
[SIZE=5]After:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://puu.sh/6yiDw.jpg[/img] --- [IMG]http://puu.sh/6yiEO.jpg[/img] [/CENTER]

item.title: Review my website design
item.dc:creator: @Esstoren Esstoren
item.description:
@Esstoren wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:7, topic:539192”]You declare it as a HTML5 document yet you don’t really utilize any HTML5 elements, not even things such as , use of tags, using the likes of cellspacing cellpadding and width on table elements is deprecated, use CSS. use of ID’s when they should be classes. You have things like this in there:

	<div id="content">
	<div class="">		<div class=""></div>	</div>

	<div class="cb"> </div>

A lot of code errors kicking around.

http://validator.w3.org/check?uri=http%3A%2F%2Ftop50servers.com%2F&charset=(detect+automatically)&doctype=Inline&group=0
http://html5.validator.nu/?doc=http%3A%2F%2Ftop50servers.com%2F[/quote]

Thanks for the feedback, the site is now better suited with alot less errors. (Can’t fix the social media errors or jQuery.) I am still working towards a HTML5 Design but that is still in the future… Amateur at work.

Read full topic

item.title: Review my website design
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

You declare it as a HTML5 document yet you don’t really utilize any HTML5 elements, not even things such as , use of tags, using the likes of cellspacing cellpadding and width on table elements is deprecated, use CSS. use of ID’s when they should be classes. You have things like this in there:

	<div id="content">
	<div class="">		<div class=""></div>	</div>

	<div class="cb"> </div>

A lot of code errors kicking around.

http://validator.w3.org/check?uri=http%3A%2F%2Ftop50servers.com%2F&charset=(detect+automatically)&doctype=Inline&group=0
http://html5.validator.nu/?doc=http%3A%2F%2Ftop50servers.com%2F

Read full topic

item.title: Review my website design
item.dc:creator: @Esstoren Esstoren
item.description:
@Esstoren wrote:

Zeldar.:

Not bad at all, but still needs something

I know… But I can’t put my finger on what…

Thanks everyone for the positive feedback so far!

Read full topic

item.title: Review my website design
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Very nice, the only thing that (I personally) would change is the margins to the left and right of the “Server Description” looks a little too crammed. Otherwise, nice job.

Read full topic
